label: 金光明最勝王経
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
見出し読み: こんこうみょうさいしょうおうきょう
説明文: A Buddhist scripture promising divine protection to virtuous rulers; esteemed as a protection for the state. It was the topic of an annual series of lectures at court, delivered by monks from major temples, which took place over a five-day period during the fifth month.
